item.description: The Jumper Classic will be at the Silver Oak Equestrian Center in Hampton Falls NH. Tickets are $20 and Jan(603-882-4516) will be the organizer for this event. If you love horses, always wanted a horse or just like to watch them do what they are trained to do this show is for you. More information can be found at jumperclassic.com. Please RSVP ASAP!

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Jumper Classic Horse Show
